titles.title: Climate Readiness Act of 2020
To direct the Secretary of Defense to submit to Congress a report on the national security implications of climate change.
Climate Readiness Act of 2020

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Climate Readiness Act of 2020
This bill requires the Department of Defense to report on (1) the national security implications associated with climate change, and (2) strategies and approaches to responding to such change. The report must consider geopolitical and military impacts, including effects on the resiliency of missions of the Armed Forces.
